title: What you Need to Know for your South Beach Business Trip
seo_title: What you Need to Know for your South Beach Business Trip
more_content:
Miami is one of the top business destinations in the world. While you may not have time to take in everything there is to see, there are plenty of amazing destinations, eateries, and quick adventures for business travelers to experience. Give yourself some free time to enjoy all the cool things that make South Beach so vibrant. Here are the essentials on how to hit the ground running on a business trip to South Beach.

Getting There

Miami International Airport is only a 15-minute drive west of Celino. Whether you’re renting a car, hopping in an Uber, or taking a taxi, crossing the Biscayne Bay to South Beach is a breeze. The Miami Beach Airport Express Bus is also a reliable, inexpensive option. After your flight, follow the hot pink signs directing you to the MIA Mover. Buses depart every half hour, cost only $2.65 each way, and drop you off at 5th Street. Simply take the 1-minute walk north to Celino and you have arrived.

How to Spend your Afternoons

It can’t be all work and no play on your SoBe business trip. As soon as you get a break, take on the town. When you stay at Celino in the heart of Ocean Drive, it’s easy. From world class eateries to the warm waters of South Beach, fun is just outside your hotel room door in the new Celino District. When you’re ready for the pulse of the city, the Celino is less than seven miles from Miami’s top urban destinations including Wynwood, Brickell, Downtown, and Little Havana. View our Explore Guide for the best in shopping, dining, parks, and entertainment.

Mix Business with Pleasure at Celino Hotel

Only a 10-minute drive from the Miami Beach Convention Center, the Celino provides its business travelers with a full selection of hotel services and amenities to make the work trip go smoothly - without sacrificing downtime fun. From our on-site dining options to our concierge services, we’ll make sure you have everything you need during your business trip to Miami. Relax in our Oasis Garden Pool or Peekaboo glass-bottom pool, get a workout in at our new fitness center, which includes two Peloton bikes for your enjoyment, or de-stress with in-room spa service.

We love our business travelers at The Celino, so we offer them a special rate and ultimate perks. Book our Business Traveler package for 10% off our Best Available Rate, a $30 daily breakfast credit, $20 transportation credit, nightly shoe shine, and complimentary use of our house car within two miles.

Celino Hotel opens its doors to extraordinary escapes, unmatched service, and unforgettable experiences in the heart of Miami Beach’s Art Deco District. Get to your exciting plans faster when you book direct with Celino South Beach.
